His preference for solitary work and resistance to change and planning are at odds with the team's collaborative and adaptive culture.

May bring a different perspective on problem-solving due to his preference for established methods.

concerns: Resistance to learning new technologies could hinder team innovation and adaptability.
Lack of engagement in team communication and planning processes may lead to misalignment and inefficiencies.
High neuroticism could introduce stress or negativity into the team environment.
recommendations: Consider a trial period with clear expectations around participation in team meetings and use of project management tools.
Pair with a mentor from the team to encourage openness to new technologies and methodologies.
Evaluate the impact on team morale and productivity closely during the initial months.
